title: An Atomic Bomb History Expert on the ‘Terrible Moral Dilemma’ in Oppenheimer
description: Author Evan Thomas on whether the U.S. could have won the war without dropping them and what he thought of the movie.

title: Why Some Doja Cat Fan Pages Are Turning Against Her
description: Fandoms are known to have names and Doja Cat's fans are no different. Doja did not like the name they chose and it caused a stir online.

title: Elon Musk Rebranded Twitter as ‘X.’ Users Immediately Rejected the Change
description: Elon Musk has turned Twitter into 'X,' inspiring confusion

title: This Female Billionaire Thinks the Secret to Women’s Wealth Is Poker
description: Jenny Just is on a mission to teach 1 million girls and women how to play the card game

title: Ron DeSantis’ Latest Staff Shakeup Is Part of a Pattern
description: “The same struggle that he has with voters, he has with staff.”

title: The Shame of the Adult Bedwetter
description: Nocturnal enuresis—or bedwetting—is a physical condition, but the consequences are all emotional.

title: Greta Thunberg Isn’t Backing Down After Swedish Court Fine For Disobeying Police During Climate Protest
description: “We cannot save the world by playing by the rules,” Thunberg said after the court fined her $240 for defying policy during a climate protest.

title: The Head of the Global Vaccine Group Gavi Is Resigning. Here’s What He Learned During the Pandemic
description: Dr. Seth Berkley reflects on his tenure at Gavi and the lessons the pandemic taught.

title: A New Rule Could Finally Slow the Rise of Black Lung Among Coal Miners
description: After decades of inaction, the federal government proposed a new rule to cut coal miner's exposure to silica dust.

title: As Israel Braces for a Crucial Judicial Overhaul Vote, One Israeli Reflects on 29 Weeks of Protest
description: Alon-Lee Green, the national co-director of the Arab-Jewish grassroots movement Standing Together, spoke with TIME about how the protest movement came to life and why Monday’s vote is a decisive moment for Israeli democracy.

title: AI Should Be Terrified of Humans
description: We need to start talking about how to protect AI from us.

title: In the Lab Oppenheimer Built, the U.S. Is Building Nuclear Bomb Cores Again
description: The effort to restart America’s nuclear-weapons manufacturing program represents the biggest test since the Manhattan Project.

title: The Specter of a Right-Wing Spain Fades, After Inconclusive Election
description: The conservative Popular Party won the election, but fell short of enough seats to form a governing coalition with the far right.

title: At Least 15 Dead and 19 Missing After Overloaded Boat Capsizes in Indonesia
description: Rescuers were searching Monday for 19 people who were still missing in rough seas.
